text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san, do you know about the 
statue of the Three Goddesses?

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
The Three Goddesses… there's a legend
that these three are the original
horsegirls.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
They watch over the horsegirls,
protecting and guiding them. Just as
gods would.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Per tradition, the students of Tracen 
Academy entrust their thoughts and 
wishes to this statue.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
The feelings they had drawn in their
dreams, the image of their trajectory to
achieve it… they entrust those thoughts
to this statue—

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
The girls who are about to start their
races will turn these feelings into
strength in front of this statue.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Sometimes, other horsegirls inherit 
these continuously spun feelings… 
It's very mysterious!
